src_original: kula-dhīte saṃgha satya-kālo ayaṃ bhūta-kālo yāva [sa]devakaṃ lokaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇa-brāhmaṇīṃ prajāṃ sa-deva-mānuṣāsurān visamvādeyyā yā ca tasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya śrāvikā-saṃghaṃ visamvādeyyā iman tato mahā-sāvadyataraṃ |  43. yaṃ yad eva saṃgha-madhye pṛcchiyesi taṃ tad eva yaṃ asti taṃ astīti vaktavyaṃ |
anujñātāsi anujñāpakehi |  āma |  yācitā te upādhyāyinī |  āma |
paripūrṇam asyāḥ pātracīvaraṃ |  deśita-śikṣā |  paripūrṇa-śikṣā sammatā |
tāṃ saṃgho itthan-nāmāṃ itthan-nāmāye upādhyāyinīye upasaṃpādeti |  yeṣām āyuṣmantānāṃ kṣamati itthan-nāmām itthan-nāmāye upādhyāyinīye upasaṃpādīyamānāṃ saṃghena |  so tūṣṇīm asya |
yasya na kṣamati so bhāṣatu |  iyaṃ prathamā karma-vācanā |  evam dvitīyā |  tṛtīyā karma-vācaneti vaktavyaṃ |  upasaṃpanneyaṃ bhante saṃgho itthan-nāmāṃ itthan-nāmāye upādhyāyinīya saṃghena |
